title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Integrating Scientific Information Competencies (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and ability to interpret digital content
context.additional_context: Formative assessment-centered program to enhance text-image integration skills in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can integrate scientific texts and visual materials with over 80% accuracy to explain core concepts
Learners apply text-image integration strategies with over 90% engagement during multimedia learning, reducing problem-solving time by 20%
Through formative assessments, learners can self-diagnose over 75% of their information integration errors

resources: Science Domain Text-Image Integration Case Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
